title: Samantha Maree: Driving Out The Darkness
description: When a bright and beautiful 10-year-old girl eventually discovers who she is and the supernatural power of clairvoyance that she possesses, will she be able to defeat what threatens the world, as she knows it?After Sam and her beloved pet turtle discover a fantastic land of fairies and magic right behind her house, she embarks on a journey of great discovery. Although she had always wanted to live an average life before, she soon realizes that her new life is far from ordinary, when she leaves her house and heads towards the magical willow tree in her back yard. Her love and strength are significantly tested... until the day she discovers the amazing girl that she truly is.Driving Out the Darkness is the second book in the captivating Samantha Maree fantasy series for kids. Come join Sam and her best friend the turtle in an enchanting adventure that will teach your kids important lessons about individuality, self-confidence and helping others.
author: Z.  Brown
